TestReportSteps.testObjective: To verify that user is able to perform hostpot analysis using rule 4 - 'Minimum Number of Fatalities'.
TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Invoke the hotspot analysis API /api/blackspotanalysis. Verify that hotspot analysis can be performed.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify rule 4.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify rule 4.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to verify rule 4.
